Distal Urethral Cancer
							                    Treatment of abnormal cells in the mucosa (inside lining of the urethra that have not become cancer, may include surgery to remove the tumor (open excision or transurethral resection), electroresection with fulguration, or laser surgery.   Treatment of distal urethral cancer is different for men and women.   For women, treatment may include the following:         - Surgery to remove th
